directions: Stir cream cheese, French salad dressing, dried minced onion, ketchup, and vegetable oil together in a bowl until smooth. Gently fold crabmeat through the cheese mix.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate dip at least 12 hours.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can lump crabmeat, drained and flaked
title: Family Favorite Crab Dip
